text: I wanted to encourage my son’s creativity and exposure to art. He’s really enjoyed the classes so much. A lot of love and attention goes into the classes too. I can see the teachers working hard to guide the kids. My son is always really proud to show me his masterpieces.

The art lessons here in Peiper are really unique and different. It lets child explores various textures, materials and techniques to create 3D art pieces, instead 2D drawings only.

The art lessons here allows child to explore, really create and craft.

Also, lessons together with storytelling are conducted in chinese by the lead teacher / founder and  who is a local Singaporean.

My child looks forward to the art lessons every week without fail.

Highly recommended!

My daughter has been looking forward to every lesson on Sunday. Each session is thoughtfully curated, blending Chinese learning through storytelling, artistic expression inspired by famous artists, and hands-on creativity. The teachers are passionate and kind. Please continue being an inspiration to the young ones!

Enrolled my son because I wanted to increase his exposure to chinese and at the same time let him explore art and craft. The craft work pieces that he brought home are amazing and we are so impressed! My son enjoyed every session! I like that he was exposed to diff mediums, i am very envious of his experience!

My girl has been attending Peiper Arts School for several months now, and always look forward to class every week! The art pieces taught are incredibly imaginative and unique, allowing students to express themselves freely.

The school also emphasizes on sustainability and will incorporate recycled materials into their art projects. Additionally, teachers engage in story telling to make the art process interesting and interactive.

We are glad to have found Peiper where teachers are patient, encouraging and passionate about art.
